wrinkled ladies there was one I did of a

of our time together but we also have
these paintings now
we met online
we met OkCupid I was hesitant to lay out
there the kind of art that I like to do
because I mean I don't know I know that
might be a big turn-off for a lot of
girls cuz he's a fantasy illustrator so
he does magic the gathering and Dungeons
& Dragons and different lorentz
role-playing games all kinds of nerdy
things I'm also a fantasy illustrator
but my work is more in the middle grade
young adult realm sometimes I feel like
we're weird clones we work back-to-back
I wouldn't say it's always like we're
just hanging out together because you
know if we really get into the work
you're kind of in your own world she's
been in probably over 125 different
paintings and drawings the way I work is
very realistic so it involves me having
set up a photo shoot as reference for
creating the drawing and then the
painting afterwards
and now I've started doing that I never
used reference like that before I met
him but I feel like that's what my work
was lacking I think my works gotten a
lot better some of my favorite paintings
are ones that I've done of her you
studying the person's face every feature
that makes you think about the person in
a different way the essence that she
brings to the image and my excitement
for making the image because she's in it
I think makes it even better
Oh
